content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (1.0, 1.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (3.0, 1.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (4.5, 1.5) connected to the Stone Furnace at position (3.0, 1.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (6.5, 1.5)

### Belt System
Consists of the following entities:
- BeltGroup with inputs from Belt at positions ((-12.5, -50.5) to (-12.5, -52.5)) and (-11.5, -49.5) to (-11.5, -51.5)), and outputs to Belt at position ((-11.5, -52.5) to (-13.5, -52.5))
- BeltGroup with inputs from Belt at position ((-11.5, -50.5) to (-13.5, -50.5)) and outputs to Belt at position ((-13.5, -50.5) to (-13.5, -52.5))

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing

### Inserter Waiting for Source Items
- Ensure that the inserter has access to source items by checking the connected entities and their inventories.
